<blockquote class="multiquote-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="border: none; display: block; font-size: 0.9em; overflow: auto; overflow-scrolling: touch; color: #6a737d; padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 20px; border-left: 3px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65); border-right: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65); background: rgb(249, 249, 249);">
<p style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; font-size: 14px; margin: 0px; color: black; line-height: 26px;">数学发明创造的动力不是推理，而是想象力的发挥	——德摩根</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">看数学公式都有种莫名其妙的恐惧感，妈蛋</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px; font-size: 22px; text-align: center; position: relative; font-weight: bold; color: black; line-height: 1.1em; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; margin: 70px 30px 30px; border: 1px solid #000;"><span style="float: left; display: block; width: 90%; border-top: 1px solid #000; height: 1px; line-height: 1px; margin-left: -5px; margin-top: -17px;"> </span><span class="prefix" style="display: block; width: 3px; margin: 0 0 0 5%; height: 3px; line-height: 3px; overflow: hidden; background-color: #000; box-shadow: 3px 0 #000,
    0 3px #000,
    -3px 0 #000,
    0 -3px #000;"></span><span class="content" style="display: block; -webkit-box-reflect: below 0em -webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom, from(rgba(0,0,0,0)),to(rgba(255,255,255,0.1)));">向量</span><span class="suffix" style="display: block; width: 3px; margin: 0 0 0 95%; height: 3px; line-height: 3px; overflow: hidden; background-color: #000; box-shadow: 3px 0 #000,
    0 3px #000,
    -3px 0 #000,
    0 -3px #000;"></span><span style="float: right; display: block; width: 90%; border-bottom: 1px solid #000; height: 1px; line-height: 1px; margin-right: -5px; margin-top: 16px;"> </span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: bold; background-color: #000; color: #fff; padding: 2px 10px; width: fit-content; font-size: 17px; margin: 60px auto 10px;"><span class="prefix" style="display: none;"></span><span class="content">一、属性</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none;"></span></h3>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold; color: black; font-size: 18px;"><span class="prefix" style="display: none;"></span><span class="content">1.模</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none;"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">模代表向量的长度，模只有正数没有负数</p>

<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold; color: black; font-size: 18px;"><span class="prefix" style="display: none;"></span><span class="content">2.特殊向量：</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none;"></span></h4>
<ol data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px; padding-left: 25px; color: black; list-style-type: decimal;">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;"><p style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">零向量（0，0，0）：它是唯一没有方向的向量，但他不是一个点，只是没有位移</p>
</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;"><p style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">单位向量：也叫标准化向量。即只关心方向不关心大小，模为1的向量。</p>
<p style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">公式：<span class="span-inline-equation" style="cursor:pointer"><span <p style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">例：<span class="span-inline-equation" style="cursor:pointer"><span class="inline-equation" </section></li></ol>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;"><strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">PS</strong>：</p>
<ol data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px; padding-left: 25px; color: black; list-style-type: decimal;">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">向量在图中的位置无关紧要，只有大小和方向才是最重要的</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">数学中专门研究向量的分支叫<strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">线性代数</strong></section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">个人认为：2/3维向量既表示<strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">所在位置</strong>，又表示<strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">方向</strong>以及<strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">位移大小</strong></section></li></ol>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: bold; background-color: #000; color: #fff; padding: 2px 10px; width: fit-content; font-size: 17px; margin: 60px auto 10px;"><span class="prefix" style="display: none;"></span><span class="content">二、运算</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none;"></span></h3>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold; color: black; font-size: 18px;"><span class="prefix" style="display: none;"></span><span class="content">1.点乘/积（Dot）</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none;"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">A（a<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub>，a<sub style="line-height: 0;">2</sub>，a<sub style="line-height: 0;">3</sub>），B（b<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub>，b<sub style="line-height: 0;">2</sub>，b<sub style="line-height: 0;">3</sub>）</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;"><span class="span-inline-equation" style="cursor:pointer"><span <p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">或者</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;"><span class="span-inline-equation" style="cursor:pointer"><span <p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">可以看出他的结果是<strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">标量</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">几何解释：</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">​	点乘结果描述的是两个向量的相似程度，即点乘结果越大，则两向量越相近</p>
<section class="table-container" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="overflow-x: auto;"><table style="display: table; text-align: left;">
<thead>
<tr style="border: 0; border-top: 1px solid #ccc; background-color: white;">
<th style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-weight: bold; background-color: #f0f0f0; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> B</th>
<th style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-weight: bold; background-color: #f0f0f0; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">θ</th>
<th style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-weight: bold; background-color: #f0f0f0; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">A与B</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody style="border: 0;">
<tr style="border: 0; border-top: 1px solid #ccc; background-color: white;">
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">&gt;0</td>
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">0<sup style="line-height: 0;">o&nbsp;</sup>&lt;= θ &lt; 90<sup style="line-height: 0;">o </sup></td>
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">方向基本相同</td>
</tr>
<tr style="border: 0; border-top: 1px solid #ccc; background-color: #F8F8F8;">
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">0</td>
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">0 &lt;= 90<sup style="line-height: 0;">o </sup></td>
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">垂直</td>
</tr>
<tr style="border: 0; border-top: 1px solid #ccc; background-color: white;">
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">&lt;0</td>
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">90<sup style="line-height: 0;">o </sup>&lt; θ &lt;= 108<sup style="line-height: 0;">o </sup></td>
<td style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 14px; min-width: 85px; text-align: center;">方向基本相反</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</section><p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">所以我们可以用向量来表一个物体在我们的什么方向</p>
<pre class="custom" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; box-shadow: rgba(170, 170, 170, 0.48) 0px 0px 6px 0px; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; margin: 10px auto 0 auto;"><code class="hljs" style="overflow-x: auto; padding: 16px; color: #abb2bf; background: #282c34; display: -webkit-box; font-family: Operator Mono, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; border-radius: 0px; font-size: 12px; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;"><span class="hljs-comment" style="color: #5c6370; font-style: italic; line-height: 26px;">//在自身的前后，返回值为正则在前方，反之后方</span><br>Vector3.Dot(Transform.forward,target.position-tranform.position)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br><span class="hljs-comment" style="color: #5c6370; font-style: italic; line-height: 26px;">//在自身左右，返回值为正则在右方，反之左方</span><br>Vector3.Dot(Transform.right,target.position-tranform.position)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br><span class="hljs-comment" style="color: #5c6370; font-style: italic; line-height: 26px;">//在自身上下，返回值为正则在上方，反之下方</span><br>Vector3.Dot(Transform.up,target.position-tranform.position)<br></code></pre>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;"><strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">PS</strong></p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px; padding-left: 25px; color: black; list-style-type: square;">

d="M35 200Q35 302 74 415T180 610T319 704Q320 704 327 704T339 705Q393 701 423 656Q462 596 462 495Q462 380 417 261T302 66T168 -10H161Q125 -10 99 10T60 63T41 130T35 200ZM383 566Q383 668 330 668Q294 668 260 623T204 521T170 421T157 371Q206 370 254 370L351 371Q352 372 359 404T375 484T383 566ZM113 132Q113 26 166 26Q181 26 198 36T239 74T287 161T335 307L340 324H145Q145 321 136 286T120 208T113 132Z"/></g></g></g></svg></span></span></section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">向量大小并不影响点乘结果的符号。</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">零向量与任何向量的点乘都是0，所以可以看作零向量与任何向量都垂直</section></li></ul>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold; color: black; font-size: 18px;"><span class="prefix" style="display: none;"></span><span class="content">2.叉乘/积（Cross）</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none;"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">这个运算只可以用于3D向量</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">A（a<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub>，a<sub style="line-height: 0;">2</sub>，a<sub style="line-height: 0;">3</sub>），B（b<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub>，b<sub style="line-height: 0;">2</sub>，b<sub style="line-height: 0;">3</sub>）</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> B =  （a<sub style="line-height: 0;">2</sub> <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> b<sub style="line-height: 0;">3 </sub> - a<sub style="line-height: 0;">3</sub> <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> b<sub style="line-height: 0;">2 </sub>，a<sub style="line-height: 0;">3</sub> <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> b<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub> - a<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub> <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> b<sub style="line-height: 0;">3</sub> ，a<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub> <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> b<sub style="line-height: 0;">2</sub> - a<sub style="line-height: 0;">2</sub> <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> b<sub style="line-height: 0;">1</sub> ）</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">叉积得到另一个向量，不满足交换律，但是满足反交换律，即 A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> B = -（A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> B）</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">几何解释：</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">​	叉积得到的向量垂直于原来两个向量</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;">叉积最重要的应用就是创建垂直于平面、三角形或多边形的向量，即法线。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; margin: 0; line-height: 26px; color: black; font-size: 14px;"><strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">PS</strong>：</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px; padding-left: 25px; color: black; list-style-type: square;">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">如果叉积和点积同在一条算式中，叉积优先级较高</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;"><span class="span-inline-equation" style="cursor:pointer"><span class="inline-equation" 500;">零向量与叉积平行</section></li></ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px; font-size: 22px; text-align: center; position: relative; font-weight: bold; color: black; line-height: 1.1em; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; margin: 70px 30px 30px; border: 1px solid #000;"><span style="float: left; display: block; width: 90%; border-top: 1px solid #000; height: 1px; line-height: 1px; margin-left: -5px; margin-top: -17px;"> </span><span class="prefix" style="display: block; width: 3px; margin: 0 0 0 5%; height: 3px; line-height: 3px; overflow: hidden; background-color: #000; box-shadow: 3px 0 #000,
    0 3px #000,
    -3px 0 #000,
    0 -3px #000;"></span><span class="content" style="display: block; -webkit-box-reflect: below 0em -webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom, from(rgba(0,0,0,0)),to(rgba(255,255,255,0.1)));">扩展</span><span class="suffix" style="display: block; width: 3px; margin: 0 0 0 95%; height: 3px; line-height: 3px; overflow: hidden; background-color: #000; box-shadow: 3px 0 #000,
    0 3px #000,
    -3px 0 #000,
    0 -3px #000;"></span><span style="float: right; display: block; width: 90%; border-bottom: 1px solid #000; height: 1px; line-height: 1px; margin-right: -5px; margin-top: 16px;"> </span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: bold; background-color: #000; color: #fff; padding: 2px 10px; width: fit-content; font-size: 17px; margin: 60px auto 10px;"><span class="prefix" style="display: none;"></span><span class="content">一、线性代数公式</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none;"></span></h3>
<ol data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin-top: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px; padding-left: 25px; color: black; list-style-type: decimal;">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong>（B + C） = A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> B + A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong> C</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong>（B + C） = A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> B + A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> C</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> A = 0（任何向量与自身叉积等于0）</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> B = -（B <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> A） = -B × -A</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">k（A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> B）= kA × B = A × kB</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; line-height: 26px; text-align: left; color: rgb(1,1,1); font-weight: 500;">A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">·</strong>（A <strong style="font-weight: bold; color: black;">×</strong> B）= 0（向量与另一向量的叉积在点积该向量本身等于0）</section></li></ol>
